CustomField.description: Task Description (per Audit Report) for the Tasks in an Audit Task Template, maps to Task object's Sub Type field. Field added as part of the Retail Audit Case Management Solution, AML/CTF Austrac Phase 2.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Task Description (per Audit Report) for the Tasks in an Audit Task Template, maps to Task object's Sub Type field. Field added as part of the Retail Audit Case Management Solution, AML/CTF Austrac Phase 2.
CustomField.label: Task Description
